disclaimer.title: Please confirm before proceeding
disclaimer.subtitle: To ensure the integrity of our community and ethical use, we ask you to confirm two important points:

bullet1.title: 1. I have a valid ticket
bullet1.text: I understand that this app is meant to raise awareness and improve planning in public transport, and not to circumvent rules or regulations.

bullet2.title: 2. I am not using the app actively during my trip
bullet2.text: I am aware that active use of the app during my trip may violate the transport operator's terms of service.
